short_summary: Supply of Electric, Sit-down Rider Forklift Truck
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of Qty two (2) Electric, 3-Wheels, Sit-down Rider Forklift Truck, group 2A (Configuration B, F) and twenty (20) Electric, 4-Wheels, Sit-down Rider Forklift Truck, group 2B (Configuration A, B, C) with training and related items in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HS-21FRKL.
full_summary:
# Call for Tender: Electric Sit-Down Rider Forklift Truck
## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: W8476-246795/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Publication Date**: May 27, 2024

## Procurement Information

* **Product/Service Required**: Electric, sit-down rider forklift trucks
	+ Quantity 2: 3-Wheel, group 2A (configuration B, F)
	+ Quantity 20: 4-Wheel, group 2B (configuration A, B, C)
	+ Training and related items
* **Tender Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**:
	+ 101 Colonel By Drive
	+ Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2
	+ Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Marie-Claude Théorêt
* **Contact Email**: [marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.theoret@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: Not available

## Tender Requirements

This tender is intended for suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified for a SA should visit [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.


See the procurement details at: 

* https://www.canadabuys.gc.ca bridge
Bidders have 30 calendar days to submit their response.
Replying applicants are requested to submit their proposal electronically.
